overview: Collection of five short films from Falcon Studios. "Fuck Truck" — Two horny good ole boys (Ed Wiley and Tom Manley) work over young blond Luke. "Toilet Training" — Handsome businessman Bill Adams cruises a restroom and comes across cock-hungry Johnny Dawes and Gary Sikes. "Use Me" — Blueboy model Steve York jumps off the magazine's pages and begins a rear attack on young Jeff Hunter with his merciless 12-inch prick. "Dirt Bikes" — Sex-starved bikers Dave Connors and Kyle Hazard drop in on obliging host Ty Granger to suck back a few good ones. "Hot Coals" — Huge-hung rednecks Dennis Love and Kent Tucker take sexy black hitchhiker Mandingo to a secluded spot and make him submit to their fuck-hungry demands.
title: Dirt Bikes
